data.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum fall sharply as crypto sell-off resumes
data.description: Bitcoin and Ethereum saw heavy selling at the start of a new month, resuming the recent turbulence in digital assets.
data.author: Hugh Leask
data.keywords: Cryptocurrency,Bitcoin,Dogecoin/USD Coin Metrics,Solana/USD Coin Metrics,Ethereum/USD Coin Metrics,Bitcoin/USD Coinbase,business news
